Title: Mechanical & Electrical (MEP) Engineer
Location: 9890 Research Drive, Irvine, CA, USA, Floor 3 - 65 Tran Nao, An Khanh Ward, Thu Duc City, 9890 Research Dr. Suite 100, Irvine, CA 92618
Job Description:
• CDI Engineering is a fast-growing engineering consulting firm, providing mechanical, electrical, and plumbing services throughout the United States. We are pursuing engineering excellence with efficiency and dedication. Our main office is in Irvine, CA, and working on expanding internationally. We are seeking entry-level Mechanical and Electrical engineers for our new Ho Chi Minh office location.
The candidate should be able to support the design and engineering of various building types, such as residential, commercial, mixed-use, retail, hotel, restaurant, factory, etc. The primary duties and responsibilities are described as follows:

• Design and prepare mechanical and electrical construction documents with AutoCAD under American codes and regulations, training will be given continuously throughout the projects.

• Work under Professional Engineers’ supervision.

Title: FRESH GRADUATES WANTED! Operations Specialist OR Customer Support Specialist
Job Requirements:
• Fresh graduates or candidates with 0–2 years of experience.
• Proactive, responsible, and able to work under tight timelines.
• Quick learner with a hands-on, “get-things-done” mindset.
• Good communication skills and ability to collaborate with teams.
• Interest in sustainability, green mobility, or smart urban solutions is a plus.

Experience is a plus — but attitude, ownership, and execution mindset matter most!
